version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: 1.1 Fix crash parent track choice when there is no parent track. 1.0 Initial release

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: v1.2 Fix crash parent track choice when there is no parent track. v1.1 Fix incorrect cluster when cur item end position inferior to previous item end position. v1.0 Initial release.

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: Added a 0 before region number with AutoNumber ON if region number under 10.

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: Parent name is now top parent track's name. Minor fixes in syntax.

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: Added first parent and top parent options.

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: New Auto Number feature that is name aware: if region parentA_name is unique and parentB_name has multiple regions, parentA_name stays the same and parentB_name is parentB_name_01, parentB_name_02, etc.

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: Change usage of region numbering script use for test

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: Fx Auto Number script command ID lookup error.
